summary: Fixes the Nordic Greatsword thinking it's a sword.
descriptionHtml:
DRAGONBORN REQUIRED BECAUSE IT'S A DRAGONBORN FIX. WHY AM I SHOUTING.

[b]The Unofficial Dragonborn Patch fixes this issue now, so this mod is available for users who don't use the unofficial patches.[/b]


If you're like me, then you wake up at the crack of noon staring at the ceiling wondering "Why is the Nordic Greatsword so broken? Why ca'n't my follower and that bandit I stabbed in the face just hold them right?"

Well....I fixed it.

All this mod does is fix the .nif file for the Nordic Greatsword so the game treats it as a greatsword rather than a sword, ending its identity crisis and invisible sword...problems.

Still, if you have any mods that fiddle with the Nordic Greatsword's stats (speed, reach, etc.) load them after this one. things should be fine and dandy then.

If you make something based on the Nordic Greatsword, by all means use this fixed .nif file! You don't have to credit me!
After all, Bethesda made it. I just fixed it.
author: JKalenad
